class.name: MaszynaMaterial
class.brief_description: A material resource for MaSzyna train models with support for seasonal textures and shader configurations.
class.description:
[MaszynaMaterial] is a specialized resource class for managing materials used in MaSzyna train models. It supports dynamic texture loading with seasonal variations (winter and autumn textures), custom shader configurations, and shadow rendering parameters. The material can be applied to Godot's [StandardMaterial3D] objects to automatically configure their properties based on the MaSzyna material definition.
This class is typically used internally by the [MaterialManager] and [MaterialParser] classes when loading models from MaSzyna format files, but can also be created and configured programmatically.

members.member: The path to the albedo (color) texture for the material. Can include modifiers like ":t" to enable alpha scissor transparency.
The path to the autumn season albedo texture. Overrides the standard albedo texture when autumn weather is active.
The path to the normal map texture for surface detail and lighting calculations.
The shader configuration name. Supported values include "shadowlessnormalmap" (no shadows), "sunlessnormalmap" (no direct sun shadows), or empty string for standard shader.
The shadow rendering priority. Higher values render shadows before lower values.
The transparency type. Allows setting one of supported transparency types
The path to the winter season albedo texture. Overrides the standard albedo texture when winter weather is active.
The path to the winter season normal map texture. Overrides the standard normal texture when winter weather is active.
